Aderonke Adeola bụ onye nduzi ihe nkiri Naijiria, ọkọ akụkọ ihe mere eme, onye ọchụnta ego ejiji, onye edemede na onye mmepụta
O ritere ihe nrite UNESCO na 2019 Mmemme ihe nkiri nke Afrịka maka ihe nkiri ya bụ Awani Ọ bụkwa onye edemede onwe ya maka akwụkwọ akụkọ The Guardian na ThisDay

Adeola bụ onye gụsịrị akwụkwọ na akụkọ ihe mere eme. Ọ rụburu ọrụ na ahịa na nzikọrịta ozi na Stanbic IBTC ma bụrụkwa onye na-emepụta ihe na RED TV tupu ọ banye n'ime ihe nkiri. Ọ bụ osote onye na-emepụta ihe na ịmepụta akwụkwọ akụkọ Half of a Yellow Sun nke e mere ka ọ bụrụ ihe nkiri
Ọ duziri ihe nkiri mbụ ya bụ Awani nke wetere ya ihe nrite UNESCO n'afọ 2019 Mmemme ihe nkiri nke ndi Afrịka na ihe nrite nke uru n'afọ 2019 Ihe nrite nke Akwụkwọ mmetụta.
